title: When i join imam in loud prayer and imam finishes fatiha
transcript: uh he says that if I come late and or in Midway in the where the IM has already recited the fat and now he's reciting another Surah and that is a loud uh uh prayer like Etc so what should I do the answer is it suffices you when the Imam has read the fa this is sufficient for you even if you were not there if you want to recite it while he's reciting the Surah this is permissible
